Added QR Code for your WiFi access point.
Easily share your WiFi access details with friends and family by having them scan your QR Code.
Subscribers can also add a home screen icon that uses your very own QR Code.

Added 2 new settings:
- Auto Connect. On app first open, it will automatically connect to the selected router:
- Initial First View. Have a favourite view that you use the most. Open to that view automatically after connect.
